title: How to find the place of publication of a book - Quora

response.answer_text: Publishing information text is often included in the first couple pages, last page, or back of cover. However, I have come across books that list NOTHING! Crazy, right? These are sometimes done by individuals rather than publishing houses that may not know or care about including all the specifics. One thing you can do is search online using the book’s ISBN number. These numbers are recorded in various databases and should contain enough information for you to track down the place of publication. Thanks!

On the back of the cover page. It tells the Publisher, the date of publication, and the place of publication, along with other info. Should you not be able to find the place of publication—sometimes it’s pretty well tucked away—look up the publisher on the internet and see were it is located.
